entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Closing a modal navigation page with physical Escape key corrupts the navigation stack #23463
  • Window.ModalPopping closes app when e.Cancel = true #23462
  • Error with running a blank MAUI project #23460
  • [iOS] Tap gesture recognizer fires tap event for a label when the label is disabled #23453
  • iOS AppDelegate - Overrides for handling remote notifications not available #23451
  • Customize Android splash screen page #23450
  • StackLayout can be expand more than screen now #23448
  • [iOS] Shapes in CollectionView will cause item height increase #23446
  • Grid Star in Android always full the screen #23445

Closed

  • Crash upon resuming the app 'window was already activated' #21948
    .NET 8 SR7
  • [Android, .NET 9.0 Preview 5] Build process randomly lefts out AndroidAsset files in Platforms/Android subdirectory #23426
  • Drawing of Borders lags behind other elements on iOS creating bizarre overlaps and glitches (okay in Windows/Android) #18204
    .NET 8 SR8
  • [Testing] Split up UI Tests into separate pipelines by category or groups of categories #21241
    .NET 8 SR7
  • Picker regression in 8.0.60 #23367
    .NET 8 SR7
  • Add SweepGradientBrush & SweepGradientPaint #23410
  • Using Dispatcher.Dispatch to set MainPage throws NotImplementedException #23449
  • Stop silent iOS updates with hard minimum requirements on xcode #19934
  • Encountered infinite recursion while looking up resource 'IO_FileName_Name' in System.Private.CoreLib #23443

PullRequests

Created

  • Added missing ui test categories #23464
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate remote notification methods #23452

Merged

  • [iOS] Crash upon resuming the app - fix #23360
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • Fixes #18204 border lagging behind content on iOS and improves initial render performance #23156
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Revert "If PlatformView has been removed use index" #23459
  • Add Additional Provisioning #23461
  • Run UI tests per groups of categories in CI #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Fixing regression in Picker behavior in 8.0.60 #23369
    community ✨
  • [Mac] Remove newly added RefreshView test #23457

Updated

  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [android]: ModalContainer Destroy commit allowing state loss #23400
    community ✨
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] SwipeView: Fix reenabling parent scrolling after cancelled swipe #23442
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
